word_mean: 神志正常的，精神健全的

sentence.Network_en: Did he come across as a sane rational person?
sentence.Network_cn: 他看起来是一个正常而理智的人吗？

sentence.Network_en: I alone was sane, I thought, in a world of crazy people.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为，在一群疯子的世界里只有我自己是理性的。

sentence.Network_en: In spite of the extremity of her seclusion she was sane.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管完全与世隔绝，她依然心智健全。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语单语词根、前缀、后缀总表 ... sanguine 乐观的 sane 健全的 sarcasm 讽刺.
2011考研英语新增大纲词汇 - 豆丁网 ... sanction n. 国际制裁 sane adj. 神志清楚的，明智的 sarcastic a. 讽刺的.
张红岩TOEFL ... sample n. 范例，样品 sane adj. 理智的，健全的 sanity n. 神志清楚的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... salty a 咸的 sane a 神志清醒的 sanity n 精神健全.

list.abs: no sane person would give up antibi-otics and anesthesia , farming and the written word .心智正常的人是不会放弃抗生素、麻醉术、种植养殖和书面文字的。
you must humble yourself before you can become sane .'你先要知道自卑，然后才能神志健全。”
allover the world market . our products with high quality , sane price and thoughtful post selling service give out all our clients with keen competition .本公司一流品质、合理价格完善服务热情奉献给海内外新老顾客并不懈努力提升客户的竞争能力。
The depressed disease that sane person meets ?, 理智的人会的抑郁症吗?
he is a very sane person ., 他是一个很有头脑的人.

entry.tran: 心智健全的;神志正常的
entry.def: Someone who is sane is able to think and behave normally and reasonably, and is not mentally ill.

example.ex: It wasn't the act of a sane person.
example.tran: 心智健全的人做不出这种事来。

entry.tran: 清醒的;明智的;合情合理的
entry.def: If you refer to a sane person, action, or system, you mean one that you think is reasonable and sensible.

example.ex: No sane person wishes to see conflict or casualties.
example.tran: 理智的人都不愿意看到冲突或伤亡。

means.word_mean: 1. mentally healthy; free from mental disorder;

auth_sentence.content: I was sober, sane and a little sunburnt.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 患精神病的,精神病患者的,极愚蠢的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+sane神志清醒的→adj.患精神病的,精神病患者的,极愚蠢的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 治疗病症的, 有益于健康的
stems_affixes.word_buile: san健康的+ative……的→有健康作用的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 心智健全的,神志清醒的,明智的,稳健的
stems_affixes.word_buile: san健康的+e→adj.心智健全的,神志清醒的,明智的,稳健的
sanat=san健康的+orium场所→健康的场所
san健康的+ity表名词→n.神志清楚

means.word_mean: 心智健全的; 神志正常的

sentences.en: By declaring him sane, the jury implied that he had a moral sense.
sentences.cn: 陪审团宣称他神志清醒, 是指他有辨明是非的能力。

sentences.en: He was sane at the time of the murder.
sentences.cn: 在凶杀案发生时他的神志是清醒的。

means.word_mean: 明智的, 稳健的, 理智的

sentences.en: She seemed a sane, well-balanced sort of person.
sentences.cn: 她看来是那种明智稳健的人。

jushi.english: She seemed a sane,well-balanced sort of person.
jushi.chinese: 她看来是那种明智稳健的人。

jushi.english: He was sane at the time of the murder.
jushi.chinese: 在凶杀案发生时他的神志是清醒的。
